verses.verse: When Athaliah<WH6271> the mother<WH517> of Ahaziah<WH274> saw<WH7200> that her son<WH1121> was dead,<WH4191> she rose<WH6965> and destroyed all<WH6> the royal<WH3605> offspring.<WH4467>

But Jehosheba,<WH3089> the daughter<WH1323> of King<WH4428> Joram,<WH3141> sister<WH269> of Ahaziah,<WH274> took<WH3947> Joash<WH3060> the son<WH1121> of Ahaziah<WH274> and stole<WH1589> him from among<WH8432> the king's sons<WH1121> who were being put<WH4191> to death,<WH4191> and placed<WH5641> him and his nurse<WH3243> in the bedroom.<WH2315> <WH4296> So they hid<WH5641> him from Athaliah,<WH6271> and he was not put<WH4191> to death.<WH4191>
So he was hidden<WH2244> with her in the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068> six<WH8337> years,<WH8141> while Athaliah<WH6271> was reigning<WH4427> over<WH5921> the land.<WH776>

Now in the seventh<WH7637> year<WH8141> Jehoiada<WH3077> sent<WH7971> and brought<WH3947> the captains<WH8269> of hundreds<WH3967> of the Carites<WH3746> and of the guard,<WH7323> and brought<WH935> them to him in the house<WH1004> of the Lord.<WH3068> Then he made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with them and put<WH7650> them under<WH7650> oath<WH7650> in the house<WH1004> of the Lord,<WH3068> and showed<WH7200> them the king's son.<WH1121>

And he commanded<WH6680> them, saying,<WH559> "This<WH2088> is the thing<WH1697> that you shall do:<WH6213> one third<WH7992> of you, who come<WH935> in on the sabbath<WH7676> and keep<WH8104> watch<WH4931> over the king's house<WH1004>

(one third<WH7992> also [shall be] at the gate<WH8179> Sur,<WH5495> and one third<WH7992> at the gate<WH8179> behind<WH310> the guards<WH7323>), shall keep<WH8104> watch<WH4931> over the house<WH1004> for defense.<WH4535>

"And two<WH8147> parts<WH3027> of you, [even] all<WH3605> who go<WH3318> out on the sabbath,<WH7676> shall also keep<WH8104> watch<WH4931> over the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068> for the king.<WH4428>

"Then you shall surround<WH5362> <WH5439> <WH5921> the king,<WH4428> each<WH376> with his weapons in his hand;<WH3027> and whoever comes<WH935> within<WH413> the ranks<WH7713> shall be put<WH4191> to death.<WH4191> And be with the king<WH4428> when he goes<WH3318> out and when he comes<WH935> in."

So the captains<WH8269> of hundreds<WH3967> did<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> that Jehoiada<WH3077> the priest<WH3548> commanded.<WH6680> And each<WH376> one<WH376> of them took<WH3947> his men<WH376> who were to come<WH935> in on the sabbath,<WH7676> with those who were to go<WH3318> out on the sabbath,<WH7676> and came<WH935> to Jehoiada<WH3077> the priest.<WH3548>

And the priest<WH3548> gave<WH5414> to the captains<WH8269> of hundreds<WH3967> the spears<WH2595> and shields<WH7982> that had been King<WH4428> David's, which<WH834> [were] in the house<WH1004> of the Lord.<WH3068>

And the guards<WH7323> stood<WH5975> each<WH376> with his weapons<WH3627> in his hand,<WH3027> from the right<WH3233> side<WH3802> of the house<WH1004> to the left<WH8042> side<WH3802> of the house,<WH1004> by the altar<WH4196> and by the house,<WH1004> around<WH5439> the king.<WH4428>

Then he brought<WH3318> the king<WH4427>'s son<WH1121> out and put<WH5414> the crown<WH5145> on him, and [gave him] the testimony;<WH5715> and they made<WH4427> him king<WH4428> and anointed<WH4886> him, and they clapped<WH5221> their hands<WH3709> and said,<WH559> "[Long] live<WH2421> the king!"
When Athaliah<WH6271> heard<WH8085> the noise<WH6963> of the guard<WH7323> [and of] the people,<WH5971> she came<WH935> to the people<WH5971> in the house<WH1004> of the Lord.<WH3068>

And she looked<WH7200> and behold,<WH2009> the king<WH4428> was standing<WH5975> by the pillar,<WH5982> according to the custom,<WH4941> with the captains<WH8269> and the trumpeters<WH2689> beside<WH413> the king;<WH4428> and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> rejoiced<WH8056> and blew<WH8628> trumpets.<WH2689> Then Athaliah<WH6271> tore<WH7167> her clothes<WH899> and cried,<WH7121> "Treason!<WH7195> Treason!<WH7195>"

And Jehoiada<WH3077> the priest<WH3548> commanded<WH6680> the captains<WH8269> of hundreds<WH3967> who were appointed<WH6485> over the army,<WH2428> and said<WH559> to them, "Bring<WH3318> her out between<WH413> <WH4480> <WH1004> the ranks,<WH7713> and whoever follows<WH935> <WH310> her put<WH4191> to death<WH4191> with the sword.<WH2719>" For the priest<WH3548> said,<WH559> "Let her not be put<WH4191> to death<WH4191> in the house<WH1004> of the Lord.<WH3068>"
So they seized<WH7760> <WH3027> her, and when she arrived<WH935> at the horses' entrance<WH3996> of the king's house,<WH1004> she was put<WH4191> to death<WH4191> there.<WH8033>

Then Jehoiada<WH3077> made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> between<WH996> the Lord<WH3068> and the king<WH4428> and the people,<WH5971> that they should be the Lord's people,<WH5971> also between<WH996> the king<WH4428> and the people.<WH5971>

And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> went<WH935> to the house<WH1004> of Baal,<WH1168> and tore<WH5422> it down;<WH5422> his altars<WH4196> and his images<WH6754> they broke<WH7665> in pieces<WH7665> thoroughly,<WH3190> and killed<WH2026> Mattan<WH4977> the priest<WH3548> of Baal<WH1168> before<WH6440> the altars.<WH4196> And the priest<WH3548> appointed<WH7760> officers<WH6486> over<WH5921> the house<WH1004> of the Lord.<WH3068>

And he took<WH3947> the captains<WH8269> of hundreds<WH3967> and the Carites<WH3746> and the guards<WH7323> and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> of the land;<WH776> and they brought<WH3381> the king<WH4428> down<WH3381> from the house<WH1004> of the Lord,<WH3068> and came<WH935> by the way<WH1870> of the gate<WH8179> of the guards<WH7323> to the king's house.<WH1004> And he sat<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of the kings.<WH4428>

So all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> rejoiced<WH8055> and the city<WH5892> was quiet.<WH8252> For they had put<WH4191> Athaliah<WH6271> to death<WH4191> with the sword<WH2719> at the king's house.<WH1004>
Jehoash<WH3060> was seven<WH7651> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> when he became<WH4427> king.<WH4427>
